display_name: Apnea-Hypopnea Index (REM): Apneas with no oxygen desaturation threshold used and with or without arousal+ hypopneas with > 30% flow reduction and with no oxygen desaturation threshold used and with or without arousal / hour of REM sleep from type II polysomnography
description: Calculated - Summary metric of sleep disordered breathing events
calculation: 60 * ( hrembp + hrop + carbp + carop + oarbp + oarop ) / minremp
